resources.string: What do you think your daily average was in the past (before starting the app)?\n\nGuess low and you can make easy progress.
What is your daily goal?\n\nThis will be used to project in the future what your averages will look like if you keep it up.
From the main screen, you can swipe to the left. If you do, it will use this value for today and hide the activity for the rest of the day.
Is higher better?\n\nEx. Pushups, you want to do more per day. Ex. Soda, you want to do fewer per day.
Which days of the week should this activity be shown?\n\nEx. If you only want to lift on Mon, Wed, Fri, then just leave those selected and the main page won\'t show Lifting on the other days.
Set value and hide until tomorrow
A7 is the average of the last 7 days including today.\nA30 is the average of the last 30 days including today.\nA90 is the average of the last 90 days including today.
B7 is the best A7 you have ever gotten.\nB30 is the best A30 you have ever gotten.\nB90 is the best A90 you have ever gotten.
Click here to start forming a new habit.
Time to start a new day
Make sure you have a unique title for your activity and all fields are completed.

This application was made mostly for myself to improve my habits based on a strategy that I think works best. Failing once does not send you back to the beginning... you must get back up and continue to strive to improve. I hope it is useful to you too.

This application uses:
 •http://www.android-graphview.org/. Licensed under Apache 2.0.
 •https://github.com/daimajia/AndroidSwipeLayout. Licensed under MIT Liscense.
 •https://github.com/bauerca/drag-sort-listview. Licensed under Apache 2.0.
 •https://github.com/douglasjunior/android-simple-tooltip. Licensed under MIT Liscense.
 •Android Asset Studio was used to generate the icon. Licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.
 •EULA based on a template provided by termsfeed.com.

Issues/Questions

Help.NotYetApp@outlook.com

The Recommended Way To Use This App

  • Don\'t create too many activities at once.
  • Set a bad historical average. This will allow you to improve rapidly.
  • Record your data. Even bad data. Always.
  • Use this app *every* day.
  • If the main habit you are trying to improve on doesn\'t need to be every day, pick a second one that does need to be done every day. Getting in the habit of using this app will hlep you build other, more important habits.

FAQ:

  • What do A7, A30, and A90 mean?

    • A7 is the average of the last 7 days including today.

    A30 is the average of the last 30 days including today.

    A90 is the average of the last 90 days including today.

  • Do I have to go into the habit to set today\'s value?

    • No, you can specify a value in the settings to be the "Swipe Left" value. Then if you swipe left from the main page, that value will be set as the value for today and then the activity will be hidden from the list

  • What if I don\'t want to do an activity today, can I hide it from the list?

    • Yes, just swipe it to the right to hide it for today

  • How can I see activities that I\'ve already hidden for today?

    • Tap the eye icon at the top of the screen to toggle whether or not ALL activities should be shown.

  • Can I update multiple values at once?

    • Yes, when looking at the page with the graph and all the dates, swipe right on a date to select it. Swipe right on more dates to select them. Enter the new value in the resulting popup.

  • How can I request a new feature?

    • Feel free to email me using the link at the top. No promises.

  • Are there any other features that I might not know about?

    • Tap a label in the Legend on the graph to toggle it being hidden.

  • Why is it called NotYet?

    • In reference to the fact that none of us (including this app) are perfect. We can only continue to strive to get better.

  • Do you make any money off this app?

    • Right now it is a labor of love. I reserve the rights to try to monitize it later.

  • What habits are you trying to form?

    • So you want me to publish a list of the things that I don\'t like about myself?

  • I really like the app, how can I help?

    • Keep using the app. Send me an email to let me know you are enjoying it. Feel free to send feedback as well. Share the app with your friends. Give me a good rating/review in the app store.

  • What features are you thinking about adding?

    • Backup of your data to Google Drive. Adding up/down arrows on the main page so that you can increment/decrement today\'s value.
Downgrading to an older version is not allowed. Please revert back to the current version.
